typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Empid as string,
		EmployeeName as string,
		Address as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Salary as string,
		Department as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 pivot(groupBy(Department),
	pivotBy(Gender),
	{} = count(Empid),
	columnNaming: 'total_$N$V_employees',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['pivotoutput.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Empid as string,
		EmployeeName as string,
		Address as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Salary as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empdata
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		{ deptname} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptdata
empdata, deptdata join(Department == deptid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> empdeptdata
empdeptdata sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['outputresult.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Empid,
		EmployeeName,
		Address,
		{ deptname}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ouputdata

source(output(
		empid as integer,
		empname as string,
		{ dept} as string,
		{ salary} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(deleteIf({ dept}=='HR'),
	updateIf({ dept}=="IT")) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		empid as integer,
		empname as string,
		deptid as integer,
		salary as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['empid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		empid,
		empname,
		deptid = { dept},
		salary = { salary}
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Empid as string,
		EmployeeName as string,
		Address as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Salary as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empdata
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		{ deptname} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptdata
empdata, deptdata exists(Department == deptid,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['existsdata.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		skills as string[],
		Address as (state as string, country as string, zipcode as string),
		contact as (phone as string, mail as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(skills),
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		skills,
		Address,
		contact
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['flattendata.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		skills
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		PO as string,
		Vendor as string,
		Apple as string,
		Mango as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 unpivot(output(
		Fruits as string,
		Amount as string
	),
	ungroupBy(PO,
		Vendor),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
Unpivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['unpivotdata.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Empid as string,
		EmployeeName as string,
		Address as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Salary as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empdataa
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		{ deptname} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptdata
empdataa, deptdata lookup(Department == deptid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['lookupoutput.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

parameters{
	deptname as string
}
source(output(
		Empid as string,
		EmployeeName as string,
		Address as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Salary as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(Department==$deptname) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['parameterizedata.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Empid as string,
		EmployeeName as string,
		Address as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Salary as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empdata
empdata filter(equals(Department, '3')) ~> payrolldataFilter
payrolldataFilter sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['payrollempdata.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Empid,
		EmployeeName,
		Address,
		PhoneNumber,
		Salary,
		Department
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> payrollempdata

sources.name: empdataset
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empdataset

sources.name: deptdataset
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptdataset

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared empdataset = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://sadev0002.blob.core.windows.net/devdemo/input/employee.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared deptdataset = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://sadev0002.blob.core.windows.net/devdemo/input/department.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = empdataset,
  #"Merged queries" = Table.NestedJoin(Source, {"Department"}, deptdataset, {"deptid"}, "deptdataset", JoinKind.Inner),
  #"Expanded deptdataset" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Merged queries", "deptdataset", {"deptid", " deptname"}, {"deptdataset.deptid", "deptdataset. deptname"}),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Expanded deptdataset", {"Department"}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Removed columns", {{"deptdataset.deptid", "deptid"}, {"deptdataset. deptname", "deptname"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";

sources.name: empdataset
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empdataset

sources.name: deptdataset
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptdataset

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared empdataset = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://sadev0002.blob.core.windows.net/devdemo/input/employee.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared deptdataset = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://sadev0002.blob.core.windows.net/devdemo/input/department.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = empdataset,
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(Source, {"Department"}, {{"totalemployees", each Table.RowCount(_), Int64.Type}}),
  #"Merged queries" = Table.NestedJoin(#"Grouped rows", {"Department"}, deptdataset, {"deptid"}, "deptdataset", JoinKind.Inner),
  #"Expanded deptdataset" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Merged queries", "deptdataset", {"deptid", " deptname"}, {"deptdataset.deptid", "deptdataset. deptname"}),
  #"Reordered columns" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Expanded deptdataset", {"deptdataset.deptid", "deptdataset. deptname", "Department", "totalemployees"}),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Reordered columns", {"Department", "deptdataset.deptid"})
in
  #"Removed columns";

source(output(
		sno as integer,
		empname as string,
		country as string,
		dept as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Empid as string,
		EmployeeName as string,
		Address as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Salary as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sort(asc(EmployeeName, true),
	caseInsensitive: true) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['sortoutput.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Empid as string,
		EmployeeName as string,
		Address as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Salary as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Allemployess
Allemployess split(equals(Department, '1'),
	equals(Department, '2'),
	equals(Department, '3'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ITemployees@(ITEmployees, HREmployees, PayrollEmployees)
ITemployees@ITEmployees sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ITemployees.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ITemployeedata
ITemployees@HREmployees sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['HRemployees.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> HRemployeedata
ITemployees@PayrollEmployees sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['payrollemployees.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Payrollemployeedata

source(output(
		empname as string,
		{ dept} as string,
		{ salary} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 keyGenerate(output(empid as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 select(mapColumn(
		empid,
		empname,
		{ dept},
		{ salary}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['surrogatedata.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Empid as integer,
		EmployeeName as string,
		Department as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['validatedata.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Empid as integer,
		EmployeeName as string,
		Address as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Salary as integer,
		Department as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employees
employees window(over(Department),
	desc(Salary, true),
	Denserank = denseRank()) ~> Window1
Window1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['windowoutput.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
